title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 701/84 of 16 March 1984 fixing countervailing charges in the wine sector
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 701/84
of 16 March 1984
fixing countervailing charges in the wine sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The countervailing charges applicable in the wine sector shall be as shown in the Annex hereto.
2. Regulation (EEC) No 167/81 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 March 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
